General.Name: CIMC Vehicles (Group) Co. Ltd.
General.Description: CIMC Vehicles (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of semi-trailers and truck bodies for specialty vehicles in China, North America, Europe, and internationally. The company offers refrigerated semi-trailers, van semi-trailers, and container skeleton vehicles; tank semi-trailers and concrete soil mixer trucks; muck trucks and truck products; and refrigerated boxes and dry cargo boxes. It also provides chassis, tractors, and related spare parts, trailers and accessories, auto parts, containers, folding boxes, tank containers, composite material products, automobile tankers, and automobile trailers. In addition, the company develops, produces, and sells various special vehicles, modified vehicles, transport vehicles, dry goods vans, mechanical products, and metal structure parts. Further, it engages in the sale of automobiles, auto parts, metal materials, hardware and electronic equipment, mechanical equipment, and chemical products; import and export of goods; and provision of leasing and refurbishment of tires. Additionally, the company is involved in the development, construction, operation, leasing, and sale of storage and supporting facilities; property management and related services; performance testing of motor vehicles; vehicle storage; maintenance of mechanical equipment; and warehousing of logistics equipment activities, as well as provides consulting services. It markets and sells its products under the CIMC Lighthouse, Pioneer Series, Tonghua, Huajun, Liangshan Dongyue and Trailer Gang, Vanguard, CIE, SDC, LAG, Ruijiang Tank Truck, Tonghua Tank Truck, Lingyu Automobile, Shandong Mastercard, and Tabyte brands. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Tianda Heavy Industries Ltd. and changed its name to CIMC Vehicles (Group) Co., Ltd. in May 2005. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

6.Name: Ms. Yi  Mao
6.Title: VP, Sec. of the Board & Joint Company Sec.
